# Xtract Core HelpCenter

> Xtract Core is a Web API server solution for creating and configuring data extractions from SAP systems. Learn how to use Xtract Core by browsing our user documentation, changelog and more.

Full: https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/xtract-core/llms-full.txt

## Getting Started

- [Getting Started](https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/xtract-core/getting-started/index.md)

- [Import an SAP Transport Request](https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/xtract-core/knowledge-base/import-an-sap-transport-request/index.md)
- [Install an X.509 Certificate](https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/xtract-core/knowledge-base/install-x.509-certificate/index.md)
- [Requirements](https://helpcenter.theobald-software.com/xtract-core/knowledge-base/requirements/index.md)
